content: crochet a beautiful textured shoulder bag with the bean stitch this crochet shoulder bag pattern uses this special stitch and a simple assembly to create this cute little shoulder bag it s a great bag pattern for beginners and the size is easy to adjust this pattern makes a 26 centimeters wide x 15 5 centimeters tall 10 2 x 6 1 inches bag the italicized notes within the pattern let you know what to do to change the size of the bag
